posts.post_content:
Seriously? You compare this to Jitte? *Everything* is *strictly worse* than Jitte. This is a crappy rare from Ice Age. Apples and oranges, my friend.  
Anyway. The art looks kinda cool. It has a hugh CMC, and a pretty minor boost, so. Yea. Strictly worse than [Yawgmoth's Will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yawgmoth's Will) and [Ancestral Recall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancestral Recall).
